meanings.definition: Excessive alertness and readiness to detect potential danger.
meanings.sent1: Her hypervigilance made her notice every little sound in the house.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's hypervigilance saved his unit from an ambush.
meanings.sent3: The cat's hypervigilance towards the vacuum cleaner was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His hypervigilance was like having a constant alarm system in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The hypervigilance of the lifeguard ensured the safety of all swimmers.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly watchful and on guard.
meanings.sent1: His hypervigilance at the haunted house made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent2: The hypervigilance of the security guard prevented any unauthorized entry.
meanings.sent3: The hypervigilance of the squirrel watching for predators was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her hypervigilance was like a shield protecting her from any harm.
meanings.sent5: The hypervigilance of the detective helped solve the mysterious case.

meanings.definition: A heightened state of awareness and sensitivity to one's surroundings.
meanings.sent1: The hypervigilance of the hiker in the forest kept him safe from wild animals.
meanings.sent2: Her hypervigilance during the test allowed her to catch any mistakes quickly.
meanings.sent3: The hypervigilance of the owl watching for prey was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His hypervigilance was like having a radar constantly scanning his environment.
meanings.sent5: The hypervigilance of the artist allowed him to notice every detail in his surroundings.
